thread.title: Kabul offers talks with Taliban 'without preconditions'

title: Kabul offers talks with Taliban 'without preconditions'
text:
Kabul offers talks with Taliban 'without preconditions' Wednesday, February 28, 2018 - 01:42 
Afghan President Ashraf Ghani offered recognition of the Taliban as a legitimate political group on Wednesday as part of a proposed political process that he said could lead to talks aimed at ending more than 16 years of war. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Afghan President Ashraf Ghani offered recognition of the Taliban as a legitimate political group on Wednesday as part of a proposed political process that he said could lead to talks aimed at ending more than 16 years of war.
